sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Navigation, Pagination, Autoplay, FreeMode, Thumbs } from 'swiper/modules'; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/navigation'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; import 'swiper/css/thumbs'; import 'swiper/css/free-mode'; import '../../App.css'; import './cardetails.css'; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; const CarDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // الحصول على المعرف من الـ params const [slides, setSlides] = useState([]); const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); // جلب بيانات السيارة المحددة بناءً على المعرف useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://admin.monzarentcar.com/api/cars/search`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { // console.log(data.cars.data.find(car => car.id.toString() === id)); const car = data.cars.data.find(car => car.id.toString() === id); // Parse and map the data as needed const fetchedSlides = { id: car.id, src: car.images || '/placeholder.jpg', // Use a default image if not available name: car.name[i18n.language], description: car.description[i18n.language] ? car.description[i18n.language] : 'No description available', pricePerDay: car.price_per_day, pricePerMonth: car.price_per_month, doors: car.doors, passengers: car.passengers, bags: car.bags, type: car.type, status: car.status, engine_capacity: car.engine_capacity, page_description: car.model ? car.model.page_description : 'No model available' }; console.log(fetchedSlides); setSlides(fetchedSlides); }) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching data:', error)); }, [id,[i18n.language]]); if (!slides) return
